name: customers
description: Stores information about customers including their ID, company name, contact name, city, and country.

name: suppliers
description: Contains details about product suppliers such as supplier ID, company, contact, city, and country.

name: products
description: Includes product-level data including name, category, price, and associated supplier ID.

name: orders
description: Holds information about customer orders including order ID, customer ID, order date, city, and freight charges(Shipping Costs).

name: order_details
description: Links products to orders with quantity and unit price for each ordered product.

name: customers-orders
description: Each customer can have multiple orders. Linked via customer_id.

name: orders-order_details
description: Each order can contain multiple products. Linked via order_id.

name: products-order_details
description: Each product can appear in multiple orders. Linked via product_id.

name: products-suppliers
description: Each product is supplied by one supplier. Linked via supplier_id.
